LanguageData.WoW_thorium_ore.label: thorium ore
LanguageData.WoW_thorium_ore.description: Raw Thorium ore. Thorium is a strong metal, mostly used in armor and weapons.
LanguageData.WoW_thorium.label: thorium
LanguageData.WoW_thorium.description: Refined Thorium Ingots. Thorium is a strong metal, mostly used in armor and weapons.
LanguageData.WoW_darkiron_ore.label: dark iron ore
LanguageData.WoW_darkiron_ore.description: Raw dark iron ore. Dark Iron is the most fire-retardant, fire-resistant metal known.
LanguageData.WoW_darkiron.label: dark iron
LanguageData.WoW_darkiron.description: Refined dark iron ingots. Dark Iron is the most fire-retardant, fire-resistant metal known.
LanguageData.WoW_mithril_ore.label: mithril ore
LanguageData.WoW_mithril_ore.description: Raw Mithril ore. “The magician’s metal”, Mithril is revered by craftsman of all trades for its extremely magical properties and light weight.
LanguageData.WoW_mithril.label: mithril
LanguageData.WoW_mithril.description: Refined mithril ingots. “The magician’s metal”, Mithril is revered by craftsman of all trades for its extremely magical properties and light weight.
LanguageData.WoW_adamantite_ore.label: adamantite ore
LanguageData.WoW_adamantite_ore.description: Raw Adamantite ore. Adamantite is a strong magically attuned metal.
LanguageData.WoW_adamantite.label: adamantite
LanguageData.WoW_adamantite.description: Refined adamantite ingots. Adamantite is a strong magically attuned metal.
LanguageData.WoW_hardened_adamantite.label: hardened adamantite
LanguageData.WoW_truesilver_ore.label: truesilver ore
LanguageData.WoW_truesilver.label: truesilver
